Name: Okunis
Description:
Manufacturer: Shubin Interstellar
Item Type: Mining Gadget

Optimal Charge Window Size: +50%
Optimal Charge Window Rate: +100%

Cluster Modifier: -20%

Increase the size and fill speed of the optimal charge window with the Okunis. While this powerful gadget makes it easier to work a deposit, some valuable resource will be lost when it shatters.  

Manufacturer Warning! Using more than one mining gadget per deposit can result in a catastrophic explosion.
